actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6420 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat timber operations as farming, for purposes of the excise taxes on special fuels and gasoline.

summary.text: Provides that timber operations shall be treated as farming for the purposes of the excise tax exemption under the Internal Revenue Code on special fuels and gasoline.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6420 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat timber operations as farming, for purposes of the excise taxes on special fuels and gasoline.
